hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This prize is awarded to the first place overall team.
This prize is awarded to the second place overall team.
This prize is awarded to the third place overall team.
This prize is awarded to the project relating most to security, mobility, and analytics.
This prize is awarded to the team with the best usage of Capital One’s API.
This prize is awarded to the team with the best usage of IBM technology/API.
This prize is awarded to the team with the best project that is aimed towards developers. Make an API, tool for developers, etc.
This prize is awarded to the best project that involves communication between multiple devices, beyond a basic web-app.
This prize is awarded to the project with the best presentation during expo.
This prize is awarded to the project with the best documentation.

Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!
$250 in AWS credit for each team member.
